name: Akash Kottil
bio:
Hi there! 👋
I'm Akash Kottil, a self-taught MERN stack developer from India. I thrive on turning innovative ideas into high-quality, user-friendly Web Apps

top_projects.name: LinkShortner-Backend
top_projects.description: This is a simple URL shortener backend built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It allows users to generate short URLs, retrieve original URLs, and delete shortened URLs.

top_projects.name: Restaurant-Website
top_projects.description: Restaurant Website Project using React js and React js UI framework Material UI.

top_projects.name: Netflix-Clone
top_projects.description: Netflix-Clone React project fetching trending movies to display movie details from TMDB database

top_projects.name: ToDo-List-App
top_projects.description: A simple ToDo list app built with React. Manage your tasks, mark them as completed, and stay organized. Boost your productivity with this intuitive and user-friendly app.

top_projects.name: pdfly
top_projects.description: A React Native application built with Expo that allows users to view, navigate, and search PDF documents. The app features a welcoming onboarding screen, smooth animations, and custom PDF rendering capabilities.

profile_summary: As a self-taught MERN stack developer leveraging expertise in JavaScript and CSS, I design and build efficient, user-centric web applications that drive innovation and impact. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality projects, I continually strive to stay at the forefront of industry advancements. By staying focused on clean coding practices and innovative problem-solving, I drive real-world results through collaborative approaches and cutting-edge web development skills.
